costModels.name: Shared contribution
costModels.description: Crew members share the costs of the journey proportionally
costModels.details: All crew members contribute to the journey expenses based on agreed proportions.

costModels.name: Owner covers all costs
costModels.description: The boat owner pays all expenses for the journey
costModels.details: The boat owner takes full financial responsibility for all journey expenses. Crew members contribute their skills and time instead of money.

costModels.name: Crew pays a fee
costModels.description: Crew members pay a fixed fee or daily rate for participation
costModels.details: Each crew member pays a predetermined fee or daily rate to join the journey. This covers their share of expenses and provides compensation for the experience.

costModels.name: Delivery/paid crew
costModels.description: Professional crew is hired and paid for the journey
costModels.details: Professional crew members are hired and compensated for their expertise and services during the journey.

costModels.name: Not defined
costModels.details: The cost arrangement has not been specified yet. This can be defined later through negotiation between the owner and crew members.
